reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 379/07: SUSPENSION PENDING INVESTIGATION (PART III OF THE ACT)
reg_info.reg_name_text: suspension pending investigation (part III of the Act)
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 379/07: SUSPENSION PENDING INVESTIGATION (PART III OF THE ACT)

content.content: 1. The maximum period of a suspension under subsection 36 (2) of the Act is two years.  O. Reg. 379/07, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The maximum period of a suspension under subsection 36 (2) of the Act is two years.  O. Reg. 379/07, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 379/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 379/07, s. 2.
